commit.message: Try to get travis running again
Removed latch input; don't think it's required anymore
Simplied graph run, removed GDump message
Added a few graph construction tests
Give compound steps a bite at passing exceptions
Catch exceptions, added watchdog, refactored examples
Added support for tracing/dumping graph status while running
Make sure Travis will notice a failing test
What version of gradle is this?
Attempt to get past weird travis issue
Added a debug log message for the actorName
Added a source location for steps
Added support for Group; refactored compound step start/end
Options are no longer a thing; everything is an input
Make sure actor names are valid
Fixed bug where iterate was doubling.
Implement simple XmlWriter; remove dep on SaxonHE
Rework node "names" as optional but easily defaulted labels
First attempt to support a conditional step
Reworked (significantly simplified) API for compound steps
Oh. One more thing. Only push docs from master.
First attempt at publishing to gh-pages
Identify the pipeline boundaries in the graph dump
Demonstrate the compound iterator step with a "double" function.
Initial commit of the core graph library
